entry.def: A hiker is a person who is going for a long walk in the countryside for pleasure.

means.word_mean: 1. a foot traveler; someone who goes on an extended walk (for pleasure)

auth_sentence.content: Another hiker followed and the three were swept over the powerful 317-foot Vernal Fall.
